data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: White Rock, California, USA (WRK001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at White Rock, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2003-05-24. The instrument depth was 000 meters, in an overall water depth of 024 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
